conbody.p: Another tab specific to an object, serves to enter information about the findspot of the object.
This tab is divided into two sections: "Place" and "Former Place".
Choose the findspot from the Thesaurus.
Add a comment to the findspot.
Select this check box if the chosen findspot is the original site where the object was created.
Select a previous find spot from the thesaurus.
Add any comment to the findspot.
Add the origin of the object if the find spot is not equal to the original location.
